General: Questions and comments about the website
Special: Material and corrections for the dictionary
Copyright: Hungarian copyright law protects both the dictionary and the search engine's intellectual property; private use is allowed; commercial use requires permission of the authors; resale is prohibited.
notNeeded: This menu item is only required for maintaining the dictionary database by logging in.
noMoreAccess: Occasionally, we can grant access only if there are very compelling reasons for doing so.
authorsName: Ádám Dr. Porkoláb and Tamás Dr. Fekete
freeOfCharge: You can always use the dictionary database for free and without logging in.
emailValid: The email of the user must be valid and unique!
passValid: For security reasons, new the password of the user must be minimum 8 characters, must contains at least 1 letter and 1 number!
editUser: Edit the data of the user
firstNameValid: The first name of the user must be at least 3 letters and must not contains numbers!
lastNameValid: The last name of the user must be at least 3 letters and must not contains numbers!
roleValid: The role number of the user must be 1 (viewer), 2(archiver) or 3(administrator)!
passValid2: Only the encrypted password is stored for security reasons. When you add a new password of the user must be minimum 7 characters, must contains at least 1 letter and 1 number! Before save the password will be automatically encrypted.
editEntry: Edit the data of the entry
hungarianValid: The hungarian meaning must be at least 3 characters!
fofValid: The field Of expertise must be at least 2 characters!
wordTypeValid: The word type must be at least 2 characters!
englishValid: The English title must be at least 5 letters and must not contains numbers!
